content: --आधानं {1} impregnation; गर्भा धानक्षणपरिचयान्नूनमाबद्धमालाः ( बलाकाः) <ls>Me. 9.</ls> {2} one of the Saṃskāras or purificatory ceremonies performed after menstruation to ensure or facilitate conception; (this ceremony legalizes in a religious sense the {%consummation%} of marriage); <ls>Y. 1. 11.</ls>
